title: Beat of The Drum wins turf feature at Santa Anita
text: Beat of The Drum wins turf feature at Santa Anita Saturday, 10 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) Beat of The Drum led most of the way to win the $55,000 feature by 3 1/4 lengths Friday at Santa Anita. ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) Long-shot Peggy Sue's Loose beat West Coast Storm by 1 1/4 lengths Thursday in the $53,000 allowance feature at Santa Anita. FOX Sports 23 hours ago - Sports NEW YORK (AP) Gotachancetodance rallied to beat Promotional by two lengths Wednesday in the $77,000 allowance feature for fillies and mares on the turf at... FOX Sports 2 days ago - Sports ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) King of Jazz won the $53,000 feature race by 1 1/4 lengths Friday at Santa Anita.
